name: George's Super Cajun Rub
author: George Lychock
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and add to a shaker
description: I tried to replicate this recipe based on sandwiches I ordered from a favorite local restaurant, the Fowler House Cafe in Quincy, MA.
image_alt: Great picture of George's Super Cajun Rub

name: Memphis Dry Rub
author: George Lychock
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and add to a shaker
description: I re-created this recipe based on a spice rub mixture I purchased from Stuart's
image_alt: Lovely picture of the Memphis Dry Rub on a rib
